item.title: Exercism: C++ mentor
item.description: You do not truly understand a topic unless you can explain it to somebody else. What is Exercism Exercism is a platform where people can learn programming languages. What is it for: learning programming languages quick, easy, hands-on and right. How does it work: you have instruction how to set up the environment you have simple exercise you have unit tests you run a unit test: it fails you google some basics: make the test pass repeat previous two steps until all provided unit tests pass Then is the fun part: you push it to the platform (submit) and a living person with relevant experience, called mentor looks at what you have done and gives you feedback!

item.title: Business
item.description: What do I do Senior Embedded C++ Developer at Sioux Technologies Maintainer and Mentor for C++ track at Exercism

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you want to get in touch just say ‘Hi!’ any time. You can do that at: Mail Github LinkedIn

item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? My name is Oleksandr Halushko and I am a software developer. What is this? This is my personal blog where I put my thoughts. Whom is this for? Mostly for me but everyone is welcome to read.
